title: Megathon
description: Annual 24‑hour hackathon focused on entrepreneurial innovation and real-world problem solving.
Attractive prize pool: ₹400,000 in 2023 (≈ 4 L INR), ₹250,000 for select problem winners in 2024.
Features industry-backed problem statements, mentorship, certificates and networking opportunities.

title: Smart India Hackathon
description: National hackathon by MoE to solve real-world challenges from government and industry.
Winning teams receive ₹1.5L per problem statement.
Includes mentorship by experts, implementation support by sponsoring organizations, and opportunity to pitch solutions to stakeholders.

title: Hedera Africa Hackathon
description: Pan-African blockchain hackathon building innovative dApps using the Hedera network.
Over $60,000 in total prizes across multiple tracks including DeFi, SocialFi, AI, and Sustainability.
Includes mentorship, grant opportunities, and global exposure via DoraHacks and Hedera ecosystem.

title: NASA Space Apps Challenge Noida
description: Local edition of NASA’s global Space Apps Challenge—India’s Noida hub for Oct 4‑5, 2025.
Annual event using NASA open data to solve real-world Earth & space problems.
No registration fee; global recognition for submissions across hundreds of local hubs.

title: Odoo x CGC Mohali Hackathon
description: 24‑hour coding competition at CGC Mohali built on the Odoo platform.
Top teams win prize money (~₹105,000) and internships.
Final round held on August 30‑31, 2025 with regional visibility.

title: ETHGlobal New York
description: Major blockchain hackathon with global participation and large sponsor support.
Prize pool of around $225,000 across tracks including DeFi and L2 scaling.
Scheduled August 15‑17, 2025, open to all skill levels.

title: ETHGlobal New Delhi
description: ETHGlobal’s New Delhi edition, open for blockchain builders worldwide.
Prize pool around $175,000 across categories like smart contracts and NFTs.
Runs September 26–28, 2025 at a premier tech venue.

title: GovHack 2025
description: Australia and New Zealand’s largest civic hackathon using open government data.
Participation via local hubs across cities in Sep 2025.
Winners recognized at national Red Carpet Awards, prize tiers vary.

title: Global AI Bootcamp 2025 (India chapters)
description: One-day AI workshop series across India and global online events.
Covers Azure AI, ML tools, hands-on labs and demos.
Free community-run event suitable for beginners and students.

title: Career Catalyst 3.0 – The Ultimate Placement Drill
description: Hands‑on placement drill with aptitude, technical interviews, and mock rounds guided by industry experts.
Free to attend; includes mentorship from Meta & GFG professionals, career insights and networking.
No certificates or cash prizes; focus is skill refinement and real‑world interview readiness.

title: Juspay Hiring Challenge 2025
description: Rigorous recruitment challenge for B.Tech/B.E. 2026 grads—MCQ, coding, and technical interview rounds.
Offers INR 40K/month paid internship (8–12 months) and full-time PPO up to INR 27 LPA.
Registration open till July 13, 2025; selection based on DSA, systems, and real-world problem-solving.

title: Software Engineering Internship
description: Work on scale software systems like NLP, AI, ML under mentorship in Google’s Bangalore office.
Full-time summer role (12–14 weeks) open to PhD / pre-final tech undergraduates.
Stipend not disclosed; competitive compensation and access to tech for innovation.

title: Full-Stack Developer Internship
description: Intern with India-based AI solutions firm building automation agents for enterprise software.
Stipend ₹25,000/month; includes certificate, recommendation letter, and flexible work hours.
Gain hands-on experience with AI, OCR, cloud integrations (AWS/Azure), and modern full-stack development.

title: T–Hub
description: Public–private incubator offering workspace, funding, and mentorship to startups.
Flagship programs include Lab32 and T–Angel for early to growth-stage startups.
Recognized as India’s leading innovation hub with global reach.

title: NSRCEL
description: Startup hub at IIM Bangalore supporting ventures across edtech, fintech, mobility.
Offers co-working space, structured mentorship, and investor exposure.
Known for programs focused on women founders and social enterprises.

title: Atal Incubation Centres
description: Pan-India network of incubators supporting idea to growth-stage startups.
Provides funding up to ₹10 crore, labs, mentorship, and investor connect.
Supported by Atal Innovation Mission, Govt. of India.

title: SIIC IIT Kanpur
description: Academic incubator focused on deep-tech, healthcare, and defence innovation.
Provides equity-free grants, labs, mentorship and prototyping support.
Collaborates with DST, MeitY, DRDO for tech-commercialization.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate
description: Validates ability to design and deploy scalable, secure systems on AWS cloud.
High industry demand and strong avg salary uplift (~$130K‑$160K).
Great for cloud architect/developer roles.

title: Google Professional Cloud Architect
description: Recognizes proficiency in designing and managing Google Cloud environments.
Average salary ~ $120K‑$150K; strong in multi‑cloud roles.
Ideal for cloud architects and DevOps engineers.

title: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
description: Global benchmark certification for cybersecurity management and risk.
Avg salary $120K‑$150K; required for senior infosec roles.
Covers domains like asset security, access control, cryptography.

title: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
description: Focuses on ethical hacking techniques to identify and fix vulnerabilities.
Hands‑on pentesting exam; avg salary $90K‑$120K.
Ideal for cybersecurity, red‑team, and pentest roles.

title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
description: Validates skills in installing, configuring, and managing Kubernetes clusters.
Ideal for DevOps and cloud-native engineers.
Exam is performance-based—highly practical.

title: Project Management Professional (PMP)
description: Globally recognized credential for project management professionals.
Avg salary uplift ~20–25%; ideal for tech project leaders.
Covers agile, risk, and stakeholder management.
